main event: A civilian reported seeing a flickering, star-like object moving across the sky in Cincinnati, Ohio on January 8, 1956, which was observed for 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed at 4:23 AM and was concluded to be the satellite ECHO I,The sighting lasted for 5 minutes,There was no photographic evidence of the object,The observer reported that the object appeared to oscillate and seemed to be under intelligent control,The observer had a military background and served in an Anti-Aircraft Unit during the Korean War.
witness description: a civilian with military background in anti-aircraft operations
